description: As a TechLead, I lead the development of technical solutions that address business needs in the creation of products and pricing for the Business-to-Business (B2B) segment.
The main functions of the position are:
1) Detecting and managing the needs for tools and products.
2) Support and follow-up in the management of Corporate Tools, acting as a liaison between Demand and Prices and Digital Solutions Iberia (DSI).
